name: A Black man in a black world
name_original: A Black man in a black world
description:
This is a game i made for testing my brothers mental will!

-Gameplay-

You have to make it into the green zone! Avoid the traps and obstacles in your way.

But there is 1 problem the world is black and the player is black!

Its a rage game.

In sec1-2 are saws and hammers. Sec3-4 are lasers, rotating lasers and pads with saws and hammers. 

For it not to be impossible i had to beat each level myself. It was hard!

Dont know if i should keep developing the game or not!
